data.actual_result: You can watch pinned and nearest to it messages in NSFW channels even if you didn't confirm your age
data.expected_result: Pinned Messages button in NSFW channel shouldn't be available until you enter the channel
data.short_description: NSFW can be watched in pinned messages on Android (not similar to #1248)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any NSFW channel - Open "Pinned Messages"
